name: bittrex.com darkblue
additional_info:
still work in progress.

update 2017-09-03:
- updated url-prefix to https://bittrex.com to not affect support.bittrex.com anymore

update 2017-08-11:
- updated width of order book to 60% and moved market history to the right of it

update 2017-08-07:
- added hover-boxes for open orders and order history for less scrolling. (only @ resolutions above 1700px width)
- removed background color from chart if the Dark theme is used.
- changed font color to white for disabled inputs. (e.g. deposit addresses)
